page.title: 04commerce in Saffron Walden
page.content: One of the changes which people who live in the town have seen in the last twenty years is the way that service industries have increased. There are a lot of estate agents in the town. Their offices are in the centre. There were two old firms but now there are eight. There are also a lot of building societies. The local society has just opened new offices on the site of the cattle market which closed three years ago. There are also the first companies involved in micro-electronics opening up. There is a new industrial estate to the west of the town. The sites there are company offices and some small works such as glaziers.
